name: Beauty and the Beast: Hidden Object Fairy Tale. HOG
description: Take a dive into the magic world of your favorite fairy tale Beauty and the Beast! Experience unusual 360-degree panoramas and 3D views in the classic Hidden Object game! Help Belle to go through all the ordeals and find love!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+, Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 1,5 GHz or more Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128 MB Storage: 500 MB available space
